News.Header: Fixed Core issues and Performance updates 08/08/2018
News.Content:
Loader:
 - Added an option to Enable Developer Console Window.
 - Fixed an issue with window 7 users that can't download addons from git.
Core:
 - Fixed an error that occurs with InGameObjects list.
 - Fixed a possible "Disconnection" issue.
 - Added Mods.KeepModelsVisible
SDK:
 - Fixed "Keep Players Models visible" mod

Loader:
 - Improved update checks.
Core:
 - Added Smooth Aiming Feature (Semi-Realistic Aiming).
SDK:
 - Added Buffs Detector (OnGainBuff and OnRemoveBuff) thanks to DaPip.

News.Header: Compiler Update, Forced Targets and Hide Names 08/12/2018
News.Content:
Loader:
 - Compiler now supports newer versions of C#.
 - Fixed an issue with installing addons using Git.
Core:
 - Added Mods.HideNames (Hides all Name mentions in-game) thanks to Hoyer.
 - Fixed some freezing issues in-game.
SDK:
 - Added an Option to select a forced Target.

Core:
 - Added GameChat.ChatIsFocused.
 - SpellManager is no longer used, refer to AbilitySystem.
 - Fixed an issue that prevented core from loading/Reloading.
SDK:
 - Fixed an issue with SpellDetector Event.
 - Improved Menu, Now menu wont open when chat is open and vice versa.
 - Fixed an issue with Prediction Velocity (Thanks to DaPip).
 - Fixed an in-game crash.

Loader:
 - Added Install Addon button to the top bar.
 - Added Overall Progress to Updater window.
 - Cleaned up some visuals.
This update fixes some of the reported issues with BattleRight.
First Public release, Please report any Issues you encounter to the forum.
